original: p'i ta barna sam kshipta pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: p'i ta barna sam kshipta pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /

original: bod skad du /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽Sherap kyi parol tu chinma sermo kyi drupthab do sum pa

original: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lady, Perfection of Wisdom.

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la padma dmar po dang zla ba la gnas pa'i dh'i:ser po yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo mi bskyod ba bzhugs pa'i ral pa'i cod pan can
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la padma dmar po dang zla ba la gnas pa'i dh'i:ser po yongs su gyur pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo mi bskyod ba bzhugs pa'i ral pa'i cod pan can
translated: After meditating on emptiness as previously taught, on a red lotus and moon seat is a yellow dhīḥ, which completely transforms into Perfection of Wisdom, yellow, with a crown of Akṣobhya.

original: / chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad nas /
analyzed: / chos 'chad kyi phyag rgya mdzad nas /
translated: She makes the mudrā of teaching the Dharma.

original: g-yon logs su pu sting dang bcas pa'i autpa la sngon po bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon logs su pu sting dang bcas pa'i autpa la sngon po bsnams pa /
translated: To her left is a blue utpala with a stalk, held with reverence.

original: na bza' dkar po'i stong g-yogs can /
analyzed: na bza' dkar po'i stong g-yogs can /

original: mdzes shing gis dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: mdzes shing gis dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: She is beautiful and adorned with all ornaments.

original: zhes de bzhin du bsams nas /🔽aom dh'i:shru ta smri ti @182a * //🔽bam dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: zhes de bzhin du bsams nas / aom dh'i:shru ta smri ti @182a * // bam dz'a ya sv'a h'a /

original: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: one should recite the mantra:🔽Oṃ dhīḥ śruti-smṛti🔽vaṃ jñāna-siddhi svāhā.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma sku mdog ser mo'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so//
translated: The concise sādhana of yellow Prajñāpāramitā is complete.
